Name: Fast Burger Simulator
About the game: Make The World's Best Burger! Fast Burger Simulator is a fast food shop simulation game. You can improve your workplace in the game. Different conversations with different types of customers. You have to pay the rent of your shop at the end of each day. You must satisfy your customers. You should have more options. Be careful, if you give bad food to your customers, they will give you bad reviews. The better your reviews, the more customers. Buy new devices in your shop. You can cook hamburgers and kebabs until morning...
